title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.7 - Entertainment fees prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.7 - Entertainment fees prohibited

State Regulations

No fee shall be collected, either directly or indirectly, for
admission of the public or inmates to athletic games and events, theatricals, or any other type of entertainment held in the institutions. Approval of the
commissioner or his or her designee must be obtained by the superintendent
before the public may be admitted to any program, exhibit or other activity of
an institution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
51.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
